description: This update with Candace Von was a very unusual shoot. At first I wasn't sure how it would turn out. Once we got to the last scene, the tank scene, I knew it was a keeper. Candace was so afraid of being dunked while bound, that she was offering anything I wanted to NOT be dunked. As afraid as she was, quitting never crossed her mind. Our interaction was quite interesting. Check it out.
title: Candace Von
